title: Sky High!
description: These curious monkeys are playing seesaw on a log. Watch their mischief as they swing up and down, learn how to balance the log, and are met by a surprise at the end. Students will be drawn by the humorous story with a big ending, and supported in their reading by clear, repetitive sentences.
reviewWords: bumpy, climbs, gorilla, jumps, monkey, mossy
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Determine cause and effect
phonics: Short Vowels : Associate the letter Oo with the short /o/ vowel sound
